ProjectMusicalInstrument_key1: Iss project mein aap ek musical instrument banayenge jo alag-alag "keypress" se alag alag note bajaye. Aapka instrument "Sa" "Re" "Ga" "Ma" "Pa" "Dha" "Ni" "Sa" - ye notes baja sakte hain ya
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key4: Google pe apne instruments ke liye sound effects dhoondiye. ye "saregama" ke notes ho sakte hain ya koi bhi alag alag sound effects.
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key5: Apne `application` ka frontend design kijiye. Ye aapka musical instrument hai - isey apna design aur personal look dijiye. Ideally aapke musical instrument mein kuch buttons hone chahiye. <audio> tags use karke har button ka audio source define kijiye.
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key6: Apne javascript `code` mein, "`key`press" event ko capture kijiye.
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key8: Har "`key`press" event mein ek event object capture hota hai. Iss event object ke pre-defined properties aur methods hote hain. Aap inke baare mein
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key11: `Key`press event ka "`key`" property mein humare `key`press event ki value store hoti hai. Aap swtich cases use karke, kaun sa `key`press hua hai, use identify kar sakte hain aur uske corresponding audio play kar sakte hain.
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key12: Har `key`press ke saath, agar aap chahe, to apne page ki koi CSS property bhi change kar sakte hain - jaise apne buttons ko bada karna ya usme koi background add karna etc.... Isse aapka page `key`press se responsive lagega.
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key14: Aapke musical instrument mein kya khasiyat hai?
ProjectMusicalInstrument_key15: Aapke musical instrument mein kya kamiyan hain? Inn kamiyon ko aap kin programming concepts ko use karke dur kar sakte hain?
